duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide leadership of the project team covering planning, coordination, scheduling, financial and cost management, contract administration, and customer communications on all assigned projects.
Ensure project completion on time, within budget, and with complete customer satisfaction.
Train and mentor less experienced Project Managers and/or Coordinators.
Lead a matrix project team providing project guidance and direction to achieve project goals.
Interface with management & clients directly, providing regular updates of project information per project.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Engineering or Business preferred (Master's preferred)
